mapper.select:
select bno, title, writer, name, regdate, viewcnt from board b, member m
order by bno desc

choose.when: where b.writer=m.userid and (name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

mapper.select: select count(*) from board b, member m
mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, content, writer) values (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
